title: Endless Runner for RPG Maker
description: An endless runner mini-game, duck or jump over obstacles to earn points

title: Skip Video for RPG Maker MV
description: Adds the ability to skip a video once it starts playing

title: Stat & Skill Levels for RPG Maker MZ
description: A fallout-esque stat and skill levelling system

title: Storage System for RPG Maker MZ
description: Add an unlimited amount of unique storage containers in your game

title: Waypoints for RPG Maker MV
description: A Waypoint/teleport system for fast traveling your game's maps.
